# Interface SafetyCheckerCreationConfig

SafetyCheckerCreationConfig Configuration for creating a safety checker instance.

interface SafetyCheckerCreationConfig {  
modelWeightsPath: string;  
}

##### Index

### Properties

modelWeightsPath

## Properties

### modelWeightsPath

modelWeightsPath: string

Path to model weights for logistic regression classifiers. The factory will load weights from this path for the specified topics.
